original_text: But strong meat belongeth to them that are of full age, even those who by reason of use have their senses exercised to discern both good and evil.
korean_text: 단단한 음식은 장성한 자의 것이니 그들은 지각을 사용함으로 연단을 받아 선악을 분별하는 자들이니라

sentences.original_text: But strong meat belongeth to them that are of full age
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 단단한 음식은 장성한 자들에게 속하며

sentences.original_text: even those who by reason of use
to discern both good and evil
